name: part_009
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2025】生誕 3D LIVE 睡夢 - suimu -【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [eV59GTk0J3s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel performs her song 'Tre bian Knight'.
Instrumental transition. The stage lights dim and re-ignite as guests Houshou Marine, Shiranui Flare, and Usada Pekora join Noel.
Noel, Marine, Flare, and Pekora (Shiranui Kensetsu) perform 'Kaguya no Shiro de Odoritai'.

subtitles.original: もっともっともっともっとまだまだ足りない
subtitles.english: More, more, more, more, it's still not enough!

subtitles.original: 本日は欲望解放パーティーナイト！
subtitles.english: Today is the desire-release party night!

subtitles.original: 乾杯！
subtitles.english: Cheers!

subtitles.original: トレビアン 暴動 美を頂戴
subtitles.english: Trés bien, give me that riotous beauty

subtitles.original: てんてこ舞いようなリズムにバイバイしちゃえ
subtitles.english: Say goodbye to a rhythm that's like a frantic dance

subtitles.original: トレビアン 暴動 美をご来
subtitles.english: Trés bien, witness that riotous beauty

subtitles.original: ぎゅうぎゅうと詰めちゃダメどんどん振り出そう
subtitles.english: Don't pack it in tight, let's keep pouring it out

subtitles.original: ぎゅぎゅっと夢のご褒美どんどん好きになる
subtitles.english: A tightly packed reward of dreams, I like it more and more

subtitles.original: フィーバー！
subtitles.english: Fever!

subtitles.original: 輝夜の城で踊りたい
subtitles.english: I want to dance at Kaguya's castle

subtitles.original: おいで！おいで！誘惑のDance again
subtitles.english: Come on! Come on! Temptation's Dance again

subtitles.original: おいで！おいで！輝夜の城へ
subtitles.english: Come on! Come on! To Kaguya's castle

subtitles.original: 出逢いがあやつるミステリー
subtitles.english: A mystery manipulated by encounters

subtitles.original: 危険なペルソナ
subtitles.english: A dangerous persona

subtitles.original: 踊ろう！踊ろう！終わらないDance beat
subtitles.english: Let's dance! Let's dance! Unending Dance beat

subtitles.original: 踊ろうよ踊ろう！輝夜の城で
subtitles.english: Let's dance, let's dance! At Kaguya's castle

subtitles.original: 夜空を切り取るレーザービーム
subtitles.english: Laser beams cutting through the night sky

subtitles.original: 私と見てよ？
subtitles.english: Look at me, okay?

subtitles.original: まばゆい星が照らす想い
subtitles.english: Feelings illuminated by dazzling stars

subtitles.original: 今宵の夢よ永遠に
subtitles.english: May tonight's dream last forever

subtitles.original: 明日のことは忘れたいの
subtitles.english: I want to forget about tomorrow

subtitles.original: 私は紅い薔薇の姫よ
subtitles.english: I am the princess of the red rose

subtitles.original: 優しくさらわれたい
subtitles.english: I want to be gently swept away

subtitles.original: そっと囁いて
subtitles.english: Whisper softly to me

subtitles.original: 意味ありげに目をそらす
subtitles.english: Meaningfully averting my eyes

subtitles.original: あなたは白い月の騎士
subtitles.english: You are the knight of the white moon

subtitles.original: 触れた手がまだ熱い
subtitles.english: The hand that touched me is still hot

subtitles.original: のがさずに抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Don't let go, hold me tight

subtitles.original: この奇跡を恋と呼ぶのね
subtitles.english: This miracle is called love, isn't it?

subtitles.original: おいで！おいで！情熱でDance again
subtitles.english: Come on! Come on! With passion, Dance again

subtitles.original: おいで！おいで！輝夜の城へ
subtitles.english: Come on! Come on! To Kaguya's castle

subtitles.original: 迷いを飲み込むエナジー
subtitles.english: Energy that swallows hesitation

subtitles.original: 眠らぬパッショネイト
subtitles.english: Sleepless Passionate

subtitles.original: 踊ろう！踊ろう！止まらないDance beat
subtitles.english: Let's dance! Let's dance! Unstoppable Dance beat

subtitles.original: 踊ろうよ踊ろう！輝夜の城で
subtitles.english: Let's dance, let's dance! At Kaguya's castle

subtitles.original: 星座が織りなすディスコティーク
subtitles.english: A discotheque woven by the constellations

subtitles.original: 私も混ぜて？
subtitles.english: Can I join too?

subtitles.original: きらめく星に誓う心
subtitles.english: A heart vowing to the twinkling stars

subtitles.original: 儚い夢でいいわ
subtitles.english: A fleeting dream is fine

subtitles.original: 明日は明日の風が吹くの
subtitles.english: Tomorrow is another day

subtitles.original: だよね！
subtitles.english: Right!

subtitles.original: 私は黒い薔薇の姫よ
subtitles.english: I am the princess of the black rose

subtitles.original: 激しくさらわれたい
subtitles.english: I want to be intensely swept away

subtitles.original: だから微笑んで
subtitles.english: So, give me a smile

subtitles.original: 追いかけてと瞳が誘う
subtitles.english: My eyes invite you to chase me

subtitles.original: あなたも黒い月の騎士
subtitles.english: You too are the knight of the black moon

subtitles.original: 瞳の奥は熱い
subtitles.english: The depths of your eyes are hot

subtitles.original: つかまえて抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Catch me and hold me tight

subtitles.original: この奇跡は恋を呼ぶのね
subtitles.english: This miracle calls for love, doesn't it?

subtitles.original: 一緒に行こう！
subtitles.english: Let's go together!

subtitles.original: ついてきてよ！
subtitles.english: Follow me!

subtitles.original: 他の人を見ちゃヤダ！
subtitles.english: Don't look at anyone else!

subtitles.original: 私だけを見て！
subtitles.english: Look only at me!

subtitles.original: 後悔するわよ！
subtitles.english: You'll regret it!

subtitles.original: 楽しもう！
subtitles.english: Let's have fun!

subtitles.original: 早くしなさいよ！
subtitles.english: Hurry up!

subtitles.original: 鈍いのですね...
subtitles.english: You're slow, aren't you...

subtitles.original: いいの？
subtitles.english: Is it okay?

subtitles.original: 私は紅い薔薇の姫よ
subtitles.english: I am the princess of the red rose

subtitles.english: You are the knight of the white moon

subtitles.english: The hand that touched me is still hot

subtitles.english: Don't let go, hold me tight

subtitles.original: この奇跡を恋と呼ぶのね
subtitles.english: This miracle is called love, isn't it?
